data.name: Alice
data.text: 因为要表达的意思不同

data.name: Alice
data.text: 个人理解，如果成功的话administration对于学生管理学校的不信任将会被消除，可是由于negotiation出现了impasse，这种误会或者说是错误的见解将得不到纠正，所以说这种僵局是unfortunate的

data.name: 洞主
data.text:
Re Alice: 谢谢Alice
答案选AE，解释：谈判僵局不幸是因为僵局加剧管理者不让学生管理学校的观念
我选的BD，解释：僵局无法避免因为谈判要打破管理者的观念

data.name: 洞主
data.text: 可能BD是因为第二分句it指代搞错了

post.text:
The students seeking undergraduate representation on the board of trustees viewed the impasse in their negotiations with the administration as (i)_____, since it promised to (ii)_____ the administration’s belief that students should take no part in running the university.

| A. unfortunate   | D. undermine |
| ---------------- | ------------ |
| B. inevitable    | E. fuel      |
| C. unprecedented | F. distort   |

---
这个题为什么不选BD呢，感觉也说得通啊
